data.title: [OFFICIALÂ®] Cubanacan Hotels
data.meta_description: hotel inaugurated in 2012 in san juan de los remedios, has 24 rooms, of which 9 are double rooms, 5 junior suits and 1 for the disabled, categorized as 4 stars
data.text:
Its setting evokes the atmosphere of the houses and salons of the XX century. Its extraordinary beauty combines eclectic architecture with elements of neoclassicism.

It is one of the most important buildings in Matanzas city. Accommodation: 17 rooms including 14 standard (9 doubles and 5 twins), and 3 junior suites. All with air conditioning, telephone, cable TV, hairdryer, safe box, mini bar. Hotel facilities: Restaurant (international cuisine), lobby bar, cafeteria, and 24 hour front desk service. Internet (wifi) service and parking.

Nearby places of interest: Sauto Theatre 400m Pharmaceutical Museum 100m Bellamar Caves 2 mi Varadero beach 24mi Tropicana Mtanzas 8mi Havana city 68 mi

Museo de la Farmacia

Distance from Hotel: 100 m

It was built for a pharmacy and opened in 1882, until January 16, 1964, when it was nationalized. It reopens its doors as the first pharmaceutical museum in Latin America on May 1, 1964 until today. Currently, it retains all the original movable and immovable elements and is the only French apothecary at the end of the 19th century that remains in the world. With Degree of Protection I, it is declared a National Monument on November 20, 2007.

Teatro Sauto

Distance from Hotel: 400 m

One of the most beautiful neoclassical buildings in Cuba. Famous for its great acoustics, it is recognized by the inhabitants of Matanzas as a symbol of the city for its architectural splendor and the hierarchy of artists who have performed in its scenario considered a paradigm of the great works of art of Cuban culture. It is for all this that it is declared a National Monument, in October of 1978.

Tropicana Varadero

Distance from Hotel: 13 km

Very close to the city center and 56 km from the Hicacos Peninsula, Cabaret Tropicana Varadero offers varied attractions in an environment surrounded by vegetation, lights, music, colors and a first line cast that delights the public with pleasant animation and excellent dances Typical Cuban He is the youngest of the three members of a family that has the queen of nightclubs on the island in the installation of the capital.

Playa de Varadero

Distance from Hotel: 40 km

One of the most famous beaches in Cuba, a heavenly place in the middle of an island that has always been in the eyes of visitors. A beach with warm and beautiful turquoise sea, despite being winter. The main beach resort of Cuba, ranked second in the list of the best beaches in the world, according to the "Traveler's Choice 2019" awards, organized by the largest travel website TripAdvisor.
